settings.title: Vapor Tight Lights
settings.content: Harsh environments, such as car washes, waste water treatment plants, subways, parking garages, cold storage, and breweries require durable light fixtures constructed to protect against moisture, dirt, and dust. Our vapor tight, tri-proof LED lights are extremely energy-efficient, IP66-rated, and warrantied for a minimum of 5 years.

settings.html:

Durable light fixtures constructed to protect against moisture, dirt, and dust while providing bright illumination at a low energy cost.

Our vapor tight lighting experts are ready to assist. Reach out today with your lighting needs & questions.

settings.title: Vapor Tight LED Lights / Tri-Proof Lights
settings.content: Car washes, wastewater treatment plants, subways, parking garages, cold storage units, and breweries are just some of the harsh locations that require durable light fixtures. For the most intense conditions, you need a fixture constructed to protect the light source from moisture, dirt, and dust. Our vapor tight, tri-proof LEDs will do just that. They are also extremely energy-efficient and come with up to a 10-year warranty. So, you can depend on our fixtures for a long time, no matter the conditions.

settings.html:
Vapor Tight LED Lights: Durable, Dust-Proof, and Energy-Efficient

Are you in need of high-quality lighting solutions for demanding environments? Look no further than our cutting-edge vapor tight LED lights. Engineered to withstand even the harshest conditions, these fixtures provide unparalleled protection against moisture, dirt, and dust, making them the ideal choice for environments that demand durability and reliability.

Our vapor tight LED lights offer robust protection against moisture and are specifically designed to prevent the ingress of dust, ensuring long-term, reliable performance even in challenging settings. Whether it's car washes, parking garages, cold storage units, or wastewater treatment plants, our dust-proof light fixtures guarantee exceptional illumination and durability, surpassing industry standards.

Frequently Asked Questions on Vapor Tight LED Lights:

  • What is vapor tight lighting? Vapor-tight lighting refers to a type of light fixture specifically designed to prevent the entry of moisture and vapor, making them ideal for use in areas with high humidity or moisture levels.
  • What's the difference between vapor proof and vapor tight lights? While both vapor-tight and vapor-proof lights are designed to prevent the ingress of moisture, vapor-tight lights provide a higher level of protection against water, dust, and bugs, ensuring maximum durability and performance.
  • Where are vapor tight lights used? Vapor tight lights are commonly used in locations that are exposed to harsh environmental conditions, such as car washes, parking garages, subways, cold storage units, and wastewater treatment plants, where traditional lighting fixtures may be susceptible to damage or degradation.
